publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-515 Mr Jamie Stone: Inverness Caledonian Thistle—That the Parliament congratulates Inverness Caledonian Thistle on their historic 3-1 victory over Celtic on 8 February 2000. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
S1M-515 Inverness Caledonian Thistle (lodged on 9 February 2000) Mary Scanlon*

S1M-515 Mr Jamie Stone: Inverness Caledonian Thistle-That the Parliament congratulates Inverness Caledonian Thistle on their historic 3-1 victory over Celtic on 8 February 2000. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-515 Mr Jamie Stone: Inverness Caledonian Thistle—That the Parliament congratulates Inverness Caledonian Thistle on their historic 3-1 victory over Celtic on 8 February 2000. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor
